mapper.select: SELECT insight_id, machine_id, insight_path, create_time FROM gmair_order.machine_insight WHERE 1 = 1 AND block_flag = FALSE AND event_id = #{missionId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into gmair_order.machine_mission(mission_id, machine_item_id, mission_title, mission_content, mission_recorder, mission_date, block_flag, create_time) values (#{missionId}, #{machineItemId}, #{missionTitle}, #{missionContent}, #{missionRecorder}, #{missionDate}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
